description.value:
This ornate helmet makes you and your allies less susceptible to fear effects and can be activated to improve an ally's attack.

Head Slot: Uncommon

Property:

You and each ally within 10 squares of you gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against fear effects.

Level 30: Gain a +5 item bonus.

Power - Daily (Free Action)

Use this power when you grant an ally a basic attack. That ally can take a standard action instead. The ally gains a +2 power bonus to any damage rolls made during that standard action.

Level 20: +5 power bonus to damage rolls.

Level 30: +10 power bonus to damage rolls.
